titles.title: A bill to amend title 11, United States Code, with respect to the definition of the term "family farmer".
A bill to amend title 11, United States Code, with respect to the definition of the term "family farmer".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This bill amends the federal bankruptcy code to increase the aggregate debt limit for a family farmer who files for relief under chapter 12 (family farmer or fisherman reorganization). The debt limit is the maximum amount of debt that can be reorganized in bankruptcy.
